item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture? Parlons francais ensemble.
For this meeting, il y a un theme. Photos- of a vacation, your dog, you as a child, or you in a French-speaking land or ...use your imagination!
Aussi, pour la nouvelle annee, pensons d'un nom different pour le groupe.
Il y a beaucoup de gens who would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un caf√© ou patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM.This month, the 4th Wednesday is Dec 24 so we will meet on Dec 22 instead. Not everyone RSVP's, so there are usually many more people than shown here.
Bienvenue! A bientot!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables in the back with the Eiffel Tower!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French December Meetup
